WRITING.TITLE: I just read Batman: The Long Halloween and...
WRITING.TEXT:
As the first comic book I've ever read, I LOVED it. The storytelling, the 1940s gangster style theme, the mystery and showing batman as more a detective than solely relying on his tech, it just made me love Batman all that more.
I'm looking forward to purchasing more such as the Killing Joke, and Hush.
What are, in your guy's opinions, the best DC comics you've read?
